mapper.select: select a.*, e.writer_id from reviewanswer a join review e on e.review_no = a.review_no where reviewanswer_no = #{reviewanswer_no}
mapper.insert: insert into reviewanswer(review_no, reviewanswer_content, a_writer_id, a_writer_name) values(#{review_no}, #{reviewanswer_content}, #{a_writer_id}, #{a_writer_name})
